name: Damsel in Distress (emavel, jeanremi)
description:
Made for Jam Shaker hosted by Mozilla in Paris, during march 2014.

Theme : Sharing

———

⚔️ How to play

In this endless runner, be a knight in shining armor and save the Princess from the clutches of a terrible dragon… unless she is running from you?!

Use arrows on your keyboard to collect hearts and evade obstacles to get closer to the Princess the truth. 

BEWARE! You may have to manage different realities at the same time…

———

— Game design: Alexis Moroz

— Code: Olden Fabre & Nicolas Hognon

— Art: Jean-Rémi Agin & Emilie Mavel Christensen

— Sound design & Music: Marc-Antoine Archier
